block.p: STEINER-Arthur. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Arthur Steiner, beloved father of our devoted members Pamela and Dr. Gary Ostrow, parents of our Leon and Gina Fromer Religious School; and Alison and Dr. Andrew Glover, parents of our Rabbi Arthur Scheiner Park East Day School; grandfather of Briana, Rebecca, Adriana and Andre. Sincere condolences to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President

Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Arthur Steiner, beloved father of our devoted members Pamela and Dr. Gary Ostrow, parents of our Leon and Gina Fromer Religious School; and Alison and Dr. Andrew Glover, parents of our Rabbi Arthur Scheiner Park East Day School; grandfather of Briana, Rebecca, Adriana and Andre. Sincere condolences to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President
